name: Pizza boy against the menacing LEGO Tutorial!
name_original: Pizza boy against the menacing LEGO Tutorial!
description:
Title: Pizza boy against the menacing LEGO Tutorial!

Platform: PC Game

Genre: Platformer

Rating: E

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: 

This game is a LEGO minigame built from the lego tutorial. It was expanded to have more enemies, moving platforms, being able to explode enemies with touch triggers.

This game is a basic platformer with the objective of touching the alter that the finish blick is on, but to get there, you have to dodge the enemies that keep you from collecting all 13 green gems!

Inputs:
Mouse movement: Camera swivel and move

WASD: player movement

Spacebar: Jump

Objective:

Touch the Alter to Win

Dante Trejo – Game Designer
